actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain apparel articles entered from February 7, 2005, to March 16, 2005, under the United States-Caribbean Basin Trade Partnership Act.

summary.text: Directs the Bureau of Customs and Border Protection to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain apparel articles.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain apparel articles entered from February 7, 2005, to March 16, 2005, under the United States-Caribbean Basin Trade Partnership Act.
